title: Everyday I say this in front of the mirror
desc: I say it out of earshot of the horse

panels.alt: A cowboy riding left to right, smoking. The sun is up and there are birds in the sky
panels.text:
I am much smarter 
 than a horse
panels.hovertext: may I never have to prove it

panels.alt: A cowboy riding right to left, smoking. The moon is up and there are stars in the sky
panels.text:
It's nice to start the day with 
  some encouraging words
panels.hovertext: may I never have to prove it
